timeline.bodyText: IOExceptions are handled by throwing a TransactionException in Elide.  We should be consistent here.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: I feel like mocking all of these objects make the tests brittle.  Also, most mocks are likely not global and should be created per test.  I would focus on mocking only the challenging objects (like the data store or something).  Everything else should use real objects.
timeline.author: aklish
